00024 #ifndef _CTOOLS_TIME_HIGHT_RES_CLOCK_H_
00025 #define  _CTOOLS_TIME_HIGHT_RES_CLOCK_H_
00026 
00027 #include "ctools/time/HighResClock.h"
00028 
00029 namespace ctools { namespace time {
00030 
00038 class HighResTimer {
00039 public:
00040 
00041     HighResTimer() { }
00042     
00047     inline void start() {
00048         startClockTick_ = ctools::time::HighResClock::getClockTickCount();
00049     }
00050     
00055     inline void stop() {
00056         stopClockTick_ = ctools::time::HighResClock::getClockTickCount();
00057     }
00058 
00063     inline void reset() {
00064         startClockTick_ = stopClockTick_ = 0;
00065     }
00066 
00067     inline ctools::time::HighResTime getElapsedTime() {
00068         return ctools::time::HighResTime(stopClockTick_ - startClockTick_);
00069     }
00070 
00071     inline void getElapsedTime(ctools::time::HighResTime& time) {
00072         time.set(stopClockTick_ - startClockTick_);
00073     }
00074 
00075 private: 
00076     unsigned long long  startClockTick_;
00077     unsigned long long  stopClockTick_; 
00078 
00079 };
00080 
00081 } /* ctools */ } /* time */
00082 
00083 #endif /* _CTOOLS_TIME_HIGHT_RES_CLOCK_H_ */
